```{r, include = FALSE}
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup}
  
  library(tidyverse)
  library(envImport)

```

```{r aoi}

  aoi <- sf::st_read(here::here("inst", "shp", "Bakara_smaller.shp"))

  aoi_buffer <- aoi %>%
    sf::st_buffer(50000) %>%
    sf::st_transform(crs = 4283) %>%
    sf::st_make_valid()

```

```{r gbif}

  gbif_raw <- get_GBIF(212 # birds
                       , aoi = aoi_buffer
                       , min_year = 2000
                       )

  gbif <- make_GBIF(gbif_raw
                    , data_map = envImport::data_map
                    )

```

```{r tern}

  tern_raw <- get_TERN(aoi = aoi_buffer
                       , get_new = TRUE # while testing
                       , veg.PI = TRUE
                       )

  tern <- make_TERN(tern_raw
                    , data_map = envImport::data_map
                    , 
                    )

```
